title: If You Spot This "So Cute" $5 Spooky Find at T.J. Maxx, Grab One
author: Ashia Aubourg
text: GroceriesProduct Reviews & RecommendationsWe independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Credit: refrina/ShutterstockI recently moved to Vermont from New York City, and the list of fun activities for me to participate in dramatically shrank, especially with the weather getting chillier. So, to add a spark of joy to my day, I took a 30-minute drive to my nearest T.J. Maxx to try to find some new decorative items to make my home more cozy. While meticulously scanning the checkout shelving, I came across the most darling ghost-shaped soap pumps, and I couldn’t resist adding them to my cart. This soap dispenser is shaped like a white ghost with black eyes and a mouth. The pump is silver, and overall, it’s large enough to fit one 7-ounce container of dish soap. It shines on my countertop and adds a pop of Halloween spirit to my kitchen. With the weather getting cooler, it’s the perfect way to decorate my house and make it more cozy without breaking the bank. You can snag one of these ghost-shaped soap dispensers from T.J. Maxx for $4.99. For years, people on TikTok have been obsessed with ghost-shaped kitchenware. When fall hits, shoppers race to T.J. Maxx to find the spookiest dish pumps, sponge holders, or mugs. This year, T.J. Maxx stocked its shelves with the most festive finds. However, the hand soap isn’t available online. So, if you don’t live near a T.J. Maxx, try out the Amazon dupe.Either way, if you’re looking for quick and easy ways to upgrade small corners of your home, head to T.J. Maxx to take advantage of its festive deals. That way, even as the seasons change, you can still feel comfy in your space. Buy: Novelty Decor Hand Soap Dispenser, $9.99
html:
• Groceries
  • Product Reviews & Recommendations

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

I recently moved to Vermont from New York City, and the list of fun activities for me to participate in dramatically shrank, especially with the weather getting chillier. So, to add a spark of joy to my day, I took a 30-minute drive to my nearest T.J. Maxx to try to find some new decorative items to make my home more cozy. While meticulously scanning the checkout shelving, I came across the most darling ghost-shaped soap pumps, and I couldn’t resist adding them to my cart. 

This soap dispenser is shaped like a white ghost with black eyes and a mouth. The pump is silver, and overall, it’s large enough to fit one 7-ounce container of dish soap. It shines on my countertop and adds a pop of Halloween spirit to my kitchen. With the weather getting cooler, it’s the perfect way to decorate my house and make it more cozy without breaking the bank. 

You can snag one of these ghost-shaped soap dispensers from T.J. Maxx for $4.99. For years, people on TikTok have been obsessed with ghost-shaped kitchenware. When fall hits, shoppers race to T.J. Maxx to find the spookiest dish pumps, sponge holders, or mugs. This year, T.J. Maxx stocked its shelves with the most festive finds. However, the hand soap isn’t available online. So, if you don’t live near a T.J. Maxx, try out the Amazon dupe.

Either way, if you’re looking for quick and easy ways to upgrade small corners of your home, head to T.J. Maxx to take advantage of its festive deals. That way, even as the seasons change, you can still feel comfy in your space. 

Buy: Novelty Decor Hand Soap Dispenser, $9.99
